text.p: True or false: Every non-zero vector space has at least two subspaces.

font.p: If [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] is a vector space, then [mathjaxinline]\{ \mathbf{0}\}[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] are both subspaces of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline]. If [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] is non-zero, then these two subspaces are different from one another.
